Guix User and Contributor Survey

November 26, 2024 at 08:43AM

https://guix.gnu.org/blog/2024/guix-user-contributor-survey-2024//

<p>Guix is gathering feedback from users and contributors on their experiences; what they love and what they’ve found challenging. Whether you’re new or a veteran we’d love to have your opinion and comments!</p>
<p>As the projects never done this before it should be super interesting. So submitted this for anyone that’s a current user, or tried it in the past.</p>
<p>For those that don’t know Guix is like Nix, but uses a single language (Guile Scheme) to define and configure the system. It’s has four elements:</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>a package manager that can runs on top of any Linux distribution (e.g. like homebrew)</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>a dotfiles and home environment manager</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>a complete GNU/Linux distribution</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>a way to create isolated development environments</p>
</li>
</ul>
